column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Zuko says : " Expecting someone else ? "
#Text=Sokka says : " Now that 's something different . "
#Text=Long Feng says : " You have made yourselves enemies of the state .
#Text=" Long Feng says : " All right , Avatar , you 've caused me enough problems .
#Text=This is your last chance ... if you want your bison back .
#Text=" Aang says : " You do have Appa !
#Text=Tell me where he is !
#Text=" Long Feng says : " Agree to exit the city now , and I 'll waive all charges against you and allow you to leave with your lost pet .
#Text=" Jet says : " You 're in no position to bargain .
#Text=" Long Feng says : " Am I not ?
#Text=" Aang says : " You 're definitely not !
#Text=" Long Feng says : " Jet , the Earth King has invited you to Lake Laogai .
#Text=" Jet says : " I am honored to accept his invitation .
#Text=" Zuko says : " You 're mine now .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Uncle ?
#Text=" Iroh says : " So , the Blue Spirit .
#Text=I wonder who could be behind that mask ... " Zuko says : " What are you doing here ?
#Text=" Iroh says : " I was just about to ask you the same thing .
#Text=What do you plan to do now that you 've found the Avatar 's bison ?
#Text=Keep him locked in our new apartment ?
#Text=Should I go put on a pot of tea for him ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " First I have to get it out of here .
#Text=" Iroh says : " And then what !?
#Text=You never think these things through !
#Text=This is exactly what happened when you captured the Avatar at the North Pole !
#Text=You had him , and then you had nowhere to go !
#Text=" Zuko says : " I would have figured something out !
#Text=" Iroh says : " No !
#Text=If his friends had n't found you , you would have frozen to death !
#Text=" Zuko says : " I know my own destiny , Uncle !
#Text=" Iroh says : " Is it your own destiny , or is it a destiny someone else has tried to force on you ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " Stop it , Uncle !
#Text=I have to do this !
#Text=" Iroh says : " I 'm begging you , Prince Zuko !
#Text=It 's time for you to look inward and begin asking yourself the big questions .
#Text=Who are you , and what do you want ?
#Text=" Aang says : " Jet , it 's me , Aang !
#Text=You do n't have to do this !
#Text=" Long Feng says : " I 'm afraid he no longer has a choice .
#Text=" Aang says : " Jet , I 'm your friend !
#Text=Look inside your heart !
#Text=" Long Feng says : " Do your duty , Jet !
#Text=" Aang says : " He ca n't make you do this !
#Text=You 're a Freedom Fighter !
#Text=" Long Feng says : " Do it !
#Text=Do it now !
#Text=" Long Feng says : " Foolish boy .
#Text=You 've chosen your own demise .
#Text=" Jet says : " I 'm sorry ... Aang .
#Text=" Aang says : " Do n't be .
#Text=" Katara says : " This is n't good .
#Text=" Smellerbee says : " You guys go and find Appa .
#Text=We 'll take care of Jet .
#Text=" Katara says : " We 're not going to leave you .
#Text=" Longshot says : " There 's no time .
#Text=Just go .
#Text=We 'll take care of him .
#Text=He 's our leader .
#Text=" Jet says : " Do n't worry , Katara .
#Text=I 'll be fine .
#Text=" Toph says : " He 's lying ... "
